journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: A 10+ year journey building solutions that matter

Jampp: Spearheaded architectural rework and modernization initiatives
Established engineering best practices across the team
Harness (ex Split): Launched features increasing product engagement by 18%
Drove Agile adoption improving sprint delivery by 30%
Reduced onboarding time by 15% through documentation
Mural: Progressed to Tech Lead managing 6 engineers
Achieved 25% increase in monthly active users
Reduced post-release bugs by 20% through code review standards
Kin + Carta (ex Solstice): Delivered full-stack solutions for multiple clients
Improved integration reliability reducing downtime by 15%
Reduced deployment errors by 50% through CI automation
